headline: STAFF DATA SCIENTIST | CLINICAL AI (NLP/LLMs) | REVENUE INTEGRITY & MLOPS (AWS)

experience_years_claims.evidence: Staff-level Data Scientist / ML Engineer with 8+ years building and deploying production ML in healthcare
and 15+ years across healthcare IT/software engineering.

experience.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer & AI Solutions Architect (Staff-level IC scope)
bullets: Led end-to-end ML development and deployment for improper payment prevention and recovery, including pre-pay claim flagging for suspected FWA and post-pay prioritization for SIU/audit workflows; contributed to $15M+ saved/recovered value.

Built LLM/RAG-based summarization to generate concise, human-readable narratives and documentation evidence packets supporting claim review and recovery workflows aligned to denial/appeal operations; reduced reviewer investigation time by 30%.

Improved model quality via rapid experimentation, cohort-based error slicing, and threshold tuning; increased precision by 13% through refined feature engineering, decision logic, and workflow routing criteria based on real-world feedback.

Trained and evaluated models using scikit-learn/PyTorch (classification + unsupervised techniques) with disciplined validation, calibration, and production-grade error analysis; iterated with stakeholders to balance precision/coverage and reviewer capacity.

Engineered features from healthcare billing/coding signals including ICD-10, CPT/HCPCS, DRG, revenue codes, modifiers, condition/value/span codes, NDC, provider specialty, peer comparisons, and temporal utilization patterns.

Built scalable, governed pipelines on AWS (SageMaker, Glue/PySpark, S3, Redshift, Lambda, Step Functions) for automated feature extraction, scheduled scoring, and real-time decisioning integrations; implemented monitoring for drift/bias/performance with alerts and SLOs.

Developed and maintained analytics/feature datasets in Snowflake (SQL + data modeling) to accelerate experimentation, standardize training/serving inputs, and support reproducible evaluation across modeling initiatives.
Contributed shared modeling infrastructure (reusable utilities, standardized evaluation harnesses, and deployment/monitoring patterns) to increase iteration speed and consistency across teams.
Mentored data scientists, analysts, and engineers on experimentation best practices, production ML, NLP/LLM workflows, and Python/SQL engineering standards.

experience.title: Senior Associate Consultant (Software Engineer, Healthcare Systems)
bullets: Developed and enhanced healthcare encounter/claims processing systems using Java and SQL/PL/SQL; improved throughput, data quality, and maintainability for high-volume pipelines.
Partnered with architects and business stakeholders to translate regulatory and policy requirements into technical designs and production releases; supported performance tuning and defect reduction.

experience.title: Programmer Analyst (Software Engineer)
bullets: Built backend services and integration components; implemented validation, transformations, and reliability improvements for enterprise workflows.
Created internal automation tools and diagnostics to reduce operational toil and improve incident response.

experience.title: Programmer (Software Engineer)
bullets: Contributed to healthcare system modules and data pipelines; optimized SQL and supported testing/UAT defect fixes to improve stability and delivery quality.

certifications.name: Data Science and Machine Learning: Making Data-Driven Decisions
